snippet: Bishop Robert McManus, the leader of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Worcester, was arrested over the weekend on a drunken-driving charge after an alleged hit-and-run accident.
abstract: Bishop Robert McManus, leader of Roman Catholic Diocese of Worcester, Mass, is arrested on drunken-driving charge after alleged hit-and-run accident.
lead_paragraph: Bishop Robert McManus, the leader of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Worcester, was arrested over the weekend on a drunken-driving charge after an alleged hit-and-run accident.

headline.seo: Massachusetts: Worcester Bishop Faces Drunken-Driving Charge
headline.main: Massachusetts: Worcester Bishop Faces Drunken-Driving Charge
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Worcester Bishop Faces Drunken-Driving Charge
